Function reference

Loading Genome Data

Functions for loading and visualizing genomic data

BrowseSeqs()
View Sequences in a Web Browser (from DECIPHER)
FindSynteny()
Finds Synteny in a Sequence Database (from DECIPHER)
pairs(<Synteny>) plot(<Synteny>) print(<Synteny>)
Synteny blocks and hits (from DECIPHER)
AlignSeqs()
Align a Set of Unaligned Sequences (from DECIPHER)
AlignTranslation()
Align Sequences By Their Amino Acid Translation (from DECIPHER)
AlignSynteny()
Pairwise Aligns Syntenic Blocks (from DECIPHER)
BrowseDB()
View a Database Table in a Web Browser (from DECIPHER)
SearchDB()
Obtain Specific Sequences from a Database (from DECIPHER)
Seqs2DB()
Add Sequences from Text File to Database (from DECIPHER)
DB2Seqs()
Export Database Sequences to a FASTA or FASTQ File (from DECIPHER)

Gene Calling and Annotation

Functions for calling and annotating genetic regions

FindGenes()
Find Genes in a Genome (from DECIPHER)
FindNonCoding()
Find Non-Coding RNAs in a Genome (from DECIPHER)
LearnNonCoding()
Learn a Non-Coding RNA Model (from DECIPHER)
IdTaxa()
Assign Sequences a Taxonomic Classification (from DECIPHER)
plot(<Taxa>) print(<Taxa>) `[`(<Taxa>)
Taxa training and testing objects (from DECIPHER)
LearnTaxa()
Train a Classifier for Assigning Taxonomy (from DECIPHER)

Constructing COGs

Functions to construct COGs from annotated genetic regions

DisjointSet()
Return single linkage clusters from PairSummaries objects. (from SynExtend)
ExtractBy()
Extract and organize DNAStringSetss. (from SynExtend)
FindSets()
Find all single linkage clusters in an undirected pairs list. (from SynExtend)
print(<LinkedPairs>)
Tables of where syntenic hits link pairs of genes (from SynExtend)
NucleotideOverlap()
Tabulating Pairs of Genomic Sequences (from SynExtend)
PairSummaries()
Summarize connected pairs in a LinkedPairs object (from SynExtend)
BlockExpansion()
Attempt to expand blocks of paired features in a PairSummaries object. (from SynExtend)

Constructing Phylogenies

Functions for phylogenetic reconstruction of genomes or COGs

Cophenetic()
Compute cophenetic distances on dendrogram objects (from DECIPHER)
DistanceMatrix()
Calculate the Distances Between Sequences (from DECIPHER)
IdClusters()
Cluster Sequences By Similarity (from DECIPHER)
TreeLine()
Construct a Phylogenetic Tree (from DECIPHER)
WriteDendrogram()
Write a Dendrogram to Newick Format (from DECIPHER)

Finding Co-evolving Gene Collectives

Functions for finding co-evolutionary signal between COGs

ProtWeaver()
ProtWeaver: Predicting Protein Functional Association Networks (from SynExtend)
predict(<ProtWeaver>)
Make predictions with ProtWeaver objects (from SynExtend)
simMat() as.simMat(<vector>) as.simMat(<matrix>) print(<simMat>) as.matrix(<simMat>) as.data.frame(<simMat>) Diag(<simMat>) `Diag<-`(<simMat>)
Similarity Matrices (from SynExtend)
ProtWeb: Predictions from ProtWeaver (from SynExtend)
plot(<ProtWeb>)
Plot predictions in a ProtWeb object (from SynExtend)
